EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Suspicious Transaction Reporting Regulations

Provision.Text: Whereas, pursuant to subsection 73(2) of the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) Acta, a copy of the proposed Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) Suspicious Transaction Reporting Regulations was published, substantially in the form set out in the annexed Regulations, as part of the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) Regulations, 2000 in the Canada Gazette, Part I, on February 17, 2001 and a reasonable opportunity was thereby given to interested persons to make representations to the Minister of Finance with respect to the proposed Regulations;

Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to section 73 of the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) Acta, hereby makes the annexed Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) Suspicious Transaction Reporting Regulations.

Subsection.Text: The following definitions apply in these Regulations.

Definition.Text: Act means the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act. (Loi)

cash means coins referred to in section 7 of the Currency Act, notes issued by the Bank of Canada under the Bank of Canada Act that are intended for circulation in Canada or coins or bank notes of countries other than Canada. (espèces)
casino means a government, organization, board or operator that is referred to in any of paragraphs 5(k) to (k.3) of the Act. (casino)

Text.DefinedTermEn: dealer in precious metals and stones

Definition.Text: fiat currency means a currency that is issued by a country and is designated as legal tender in that country. (monnaie fiduciaire)

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: cash and other fiat currencies, and securities, negotiable instruments or other financial instruments that indicate a title or right to or interest in them; or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a private key of a cryptographic system that enables a person or entity to have access to a fiat currency other than cash.

ContinuedDefinition.Text: For greater certainty, it does not include virtual currency. (fonds)

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a terrorist group as defined in subsection 83.01(1) of the Criminal Code;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a person or entity that is the subject of an order or regulation made under the United Nations Act; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a foreign state, as defined in section 2 of the Special Economic Measures Act, that is the subject of an order or regulation made under the United Nations Act. (personne ou entité inscrite)

Text.DefinedTermEn: real estate broker or sales representative

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a digital representation of value that can be used for payment or investment purposes that is not a fiat currency and that can be readily exchanged for funds or for another virtual currency that can be readily exchanged for funds; or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a private key of a cryptographic system that enables a person or entity to have access to a digital representation of value referred to in paragraph (a). (monnaie virtuelle)

Section.Text: If a registered charity, as defined in subsection 248(1) of the Income Tax Act, conducts and manages, in a permanent establishment of a casino, a lottery scheme that includes games of roulette or card games for a period of not more than two consecutive days at a time and, in doing so, acts under the supervision of the government of a province that is referred to in paragraph 5(k) of the Act, or of an organization that is referred to in paragraph 5(k.2) of the Act, that conducts and manages such a lottery scheme in the same establishment, the lottery scheme that is conducted and managed by the registered charity is considered to be conducted and managed by the supervising government or organization.

Heading.TitleText: Report Under Section 7 of the Act

Subsection.Text: Subject to section 11, a report made under section 7 of the Act concerning a financial transaction or attempted financial transaction in respect of which there are reasonable grounds to suspect that the transaction or attempted transaction is related to the commission of a money laundering offence, a terrorist activity financing offence or a sanctions evasion offence shall contain the information set out in Schedule 1.

The person or entity shall send the report to the Centre as soon as practicable after they have taken measures that enable them to establish that there are reasonable grounds to suspect that the transaction or attempted transaction is related to the commission of a money laundering offence, a terrorist activity financing offence or a sanctions evasion offence.

Heading.TitleText: Report Under Section 7.1 of the Act

Subsection.Text: Subject to section 11, a report made under paragraph 7.1(1)(a) or (b) of the Act shall contain the information set out in Schedule 2.
The person or entity shall send the report to the Centre immediately.

The requirement to report information set out in Schedule 1 or 2 does not apply in respect of information set out in an item of that Schedule that is not marked with an asterisk if, after taking reasonable measures to do so, the person or entity is unable to obtain the information.

In the case of an attempted transaction, the requirement to report information set out in Schedule 1 does not apply in respect of information set out in an item of that Schedule that is marked with an asterisk if, after taking reasonable measures to do so, the person or entity is unable to obtain the information.

The requirement to report information set out in Schedule 1 or 2 does not apply if the person or entity believes that taking the reasonable measures to obtain the information would inform a person or entity that conducts or attempts or proposes to conduct a transaction with them that the transaction and related information will be reported under section 7 or 7.1 of the Act.
For greater certainty, although items in Schedules 1 and 2 are described in the singular, a person or entity shall report all known information that falls within an item.
For greater certainty, a person or entity is not required to report information set out in any item of Schedule 1 or 2 that is not applicable in the circumstances.

Section.Text: A report shall be sent electronically in accordance with guidelines that are prepared by the Centre, if the sender has the technical capabilities to do so. If the sender does not have the technical capabilities to send the report electronically, the report shall be sent in paper format in accordance with guidelines that are prepared by the Centre.

Subsection.Text: A person or entity that sends a report to the Centre shall keep a copy of the report for a period of at least five years after the day on which the report is sent.
The copy of the report may be kept in a machine-readable or electronic form if a paper copy can be readily produced from it.

For greater certainty, if the copy is the property of a person’s employer or of a person or entity with which the person is in a contractual relationship, the person is not required to keep it after the end of their employment or the contractual relationship.

Section.Text: The information that is prescribed as designated information for the purposes of paragraphs 55(7)(f), 55.1(3)(f) and 56.1(5)(f) of the Act is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the following information concerning any person or entity that is involved in the transaction, attempted transaction, importation or exportation or any person or entity acting on their behalf:

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: their address, telephone number and email address,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: in the case of a person, their alias, date of birth and citizenship,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: in the case of a person, the number of an identification document issued to them by the federal government or a provincial government or by a foreign government that is not a municipal government, other than a document that contains their social insurance number, the issuing authority and, if available, the jurisdiction and country of issue and expiry date of the identification document,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: in the case of an entity that is involved in the transaction, attempted transaction, importation or exportation, the date of its registration or incorporation, its registration or incorporation number and the jurisdiction and country of issue of that number,

Subparagraph.Label: (vii)
Subparagraph.Text: the name and address of any person or entity on whose behalf the financial transaction or attempted financial transaction is conducted or on whose behalf the importation or exportation is carried out, and

Subparagraph.Label: (viii)
Subparagraph.Text: the telephone number of the place of business where the financial transaction or attempted financial transaction occurred;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in the case of a financial transaction or attempted financial transaction, the following information:

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: every account number and transit number that is involved,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the name of each account holder,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: the number of the transaction or attempted transaction and every other reference number that is connected to the transaction or attempted transaction,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: the time of the transaction or attempted transaction,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: the type of transaction or attempted transaction,

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: the names of the parties to the transaction or attempted transaction,

Subparagraph.Label: (viii)
Subparagraph.Text: the name and address of each person who is authorized to act in respect of the account, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ix)
Subparagraph.Text: the type of report, as listed in paragraph 54(1)(a) of the Act, from which the information disclosed is compiled; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in the case of an importation or exportation of fiat currency or monetary instruments, the country from which they are being imported or the country to which they are being exported.

ScheduleFormHeading.Label: SCHEDULE 1
ScheduleFormHeading.TitleText: Suspicious Transaction or Attempted Transaction Report

Heading.Label: PART A
Heading.TitleText: Information with Respect to Reporting Person or Entity and Place of Business Where Transaction Is Conducted or Attempted

Item.Text: Person’s or entity’s name

Type of person or entity, as described in any of paragraphs 5(a) to (h.1), (k) and (m) of the Act, or, if person or entity is referred to in paragraph 5(i), (j) or (l) of the Act, type of prescribed business, profession or activity referred to in that paragraph
Identification number assigned to person or entity by Centre
Number that identifies place of business
Address of place of business
Contact person’s name
Contact person’s email address
Contact person’s telephone number

Heading.Label: PART B
Heading.TitleText: Information with Respect to Transaction or Attempted Transaction

Item.Text: Date of transaction or attempted transaction or night deposit indicator
Time of transaction or attempted transaction
Posting date, if different from date of transaction or attempted transaction
Type and amount of funds or other assets involved, other than virtual currency
Type and amount of each fiat currency or virtual currency involved
Method by which transaction or attempted transaction conducted
Exchange rates used
In the case of transaction or attempted transaction involving virtual currency, transaction identifiers, including sending and receiving addresses
Indication of whether transaction completed
If transaction not completed, reason why not completed
Purpose of transaction or attempted transaction
Source of funds or virtual currency involved

Name of every person or entity that is source of funds or virtual currency involved and their account number or policy number and name of the person or entity with which the account or policy is held or, if no account number or policy number, identifying number and name of the person or entity that issued it
Following details of remittance of, or in exchange for, funds or virtual currency received:

Item.Label: (a)
Item.Text: method of remittance

Item.Label: (b)
Item.Text: if remittance is in funds, type and amount of each type of funds involved

Item.Label: (c)
Item.Text: if remittance is in virtual currency, type and amount of each virtual currency involved

Item.Label: (d)
Item.Text: if remittance is not in funds or virtual currency, type of remittance and its value, if different from amount of funds or virtual currency received

Item.Label: (e)
Item.Text: name of every person or entity involved and their account number or policy number and name of the person or entity with which the account or policy is held or, if no account number or policy number, identifying number and name of the person or entity that issued it
Every account number and other equivalent reference number connected to transaction or attempted transaction
Name of person or entity with which the account is held or of person or entity that issued the reference number
Type of account
Branch number, institution number and similar numbers connected to account or reference number
Name of each account holder
Type of fiat currency or virtual currency of account
Date account opened
Date account closed
Status of account

Heading.Label: PART D
Heading.TitleText: Information with Respect to Person or Entity That Conducts or Attempts To Conduct Transaction

Item.Text: Person’s or entity’s name
Person’s or entity’s address
Person’s or entity’s email address
Person’s or entity’s telephone number
Person’s or entity’s URL
Nature of person’s or entity’s principal business or their occupation
Identification number assigned to person or entity by reporting person or entity

Type of document or other information used to identify person or entity, or to verify their identity under the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Regulations, and number of document or number associated with information
Jurisdiction and country of issue of document or other information
Type of device used by person or entity that conducts or attempts to conduct transaction online
Number that identifies device
Internet Protocol address used by device
Person’s or entity’s user name
Date and time of person’s or entity’s online session in which transaction conducted or attempted
In the case of a person,

Item.Label: (a)
Item.Text: their alias

Item.Label: (b)
Item.Text: their date of birth

Item.Label: (c)
Item.Text: their country of residence

Item.Label: (d)
Item.Text: their citizenship

Item.Label: (e)
Item.Text: their employer’s name

Item.Label: (f)
Item.Text: their employer’s business address

Item.Label: (g)
Item.Text: their employer’s business telephone number
In the case of an entity,

Item.Label: (a)
Item.Text: name of each person — up to three — who is authorized to bind entity or to act with respect to account

Item.Label: (b)
Item.Text: its registration or incorporation number and jurisdiction and country of issue of that number

Item.Label: (c)
Item.Text: information respecting ownership, control and structure of entity

Item.Label: (d)
Item.Text: name of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of entity

Item.Label: (e)
Item.Text: if entity is a corporation,

Item.Label: (i)
Item.Text: name of each director

Item.Label: (ii)
Item.Text: address of each director

Item.Label: (iii)
Item.Text: telephone number of each director

Item.Label: (iv)
Item.Text: name of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of shares of corporation

Item.Label: (f)
Item.Text: if entity is a trust

Item.Label: (i)
Item.Text: name of each trustee

Item.Label: (ii)
Item.Text: address of each trustee

Item.Label: (iii)
Item.Text: telephone number of each trustee

Item.Label: (iv)
Item.Text: name of each settlor of trust

Item.Label: (v)
Item.Text: address of each settlor of trust

Item.Label: (vi)
Item.Text: telephone number of each settlor of trust

Item.Label: (vii)
Item.Text: name of each beneficiary of trust, other than widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (viii)
Item.Text: address of each beneficiary of trust, other than widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (ix)
Item.Text: telephone number of each beneficiary of trust, other than widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (x)
Item.Text: name of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of units of widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (xi)
Item.Text: address of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of units of widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (xii)
Item.Text: telephone number of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of units of widely held or publicly traded trust

ScheduleFormHeading.Label: SCHEDULE 2
ScheduleFormHeading.TitleText: Listed Person or Entity Property Report

Heading.Label: PART A
Heading.TitleText: Information With Respect to Reporting Person or Entity and Place of Business Where Transaction Is Conducted or Proposed To Be Conducted

Item.Text: Person’s or entity’s name

Type of person or entity, as described in any of paragraphs 5(a) to (h.1) and (k) of the Act, or, if person or entity is referred to in paragraph 5(i), (j) or (l) of the Act, type of prescribed business, profession or activity referred to in that paragraph
Identification number assigned to person or entity by Centre
Number that identifies place of business
Address of place of business
Contact person’s name
Contact person’s email address
Contact person’s telephone number
Reason for filing report
Indication of how reporting person or entity came to know that property in question is owned, held or controlled by or on behalf of listed person or entity
Indication of how reporting person or entity identified listed person or entity
Type of property
Means used to identify property and every number of, or associated with, that property
Approximate or actual value of property
Description of property
Name of any person or entity that owns, holds or controls property on behalf of listed person or entity
Name of any person or entity that has an interest or right in or is authorized to deal with property
Description of transactions involving property within previous six months
Identifying number of any report made under section 7 of the Act respecting property
Description of any measures taken by reporting person or entity with respect to property

Address of listed person or entity

Telephone number of listed person or entity

Jurisdiction and country of issue of identification document or information

Item.Label: (b)

Item.Label: (c)

Item.Text: information respecting ownership, control and structure of entity

Item.Label: (d)
Item.Text: name of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of entity

Item.Label: (e)
Item.Text: if entity is a corporation,

Item.Label: (i)
Item.Text: name of each director

Item.Label: (ii)
Item.Text: address of each director

Item.Label: (iii)
Item.Text: telephone number of each director

Item.Label: (iv)
Item.Text: name of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of shares of corporation

Item.Label: (f)
Item.Text: if entity is a trust,

Item.Label: (i)
Item.Text: name of each trustee

Item.Label: (ii)
Item.Text: address of each trustee

Item.Label: (iii)
Item.Text: telephone number of each trustee

Item.Label: (iv)
Item.Text: name of each settlor of trust

Item.Label: (v)
Item.Text: address of each settlor of trust

Item.Label: (vi)
Item.Text: telephone number of each settlor of trust

Item.Label: (vii)
Item.Text: name of each beneficiary of trust, other than widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (viii)
Item.Text: address of each beneficiary of trust, other than widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (ix)
Item.Text: telephone number of each beneficiary of trust, other than widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (x)
Item.Text: name of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of units of widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (xi)
Item.Text: address of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of units of widely held or publicly traded trust

Item.Label: (xii)
Item.Text: telephone number of each person who directly or indirectly owns or controls 25% or more of units of widely held or publicly traded trust

Subsection.Text: The definition listed person or entity in subsection 1(2) of the Regulations is amended by striking out “or” at the end of paragraph (b) and by replacing paragraph (c) with the following:

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a person or entity that is the subject of an order or regulation made under the Special Economic Measures Act;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a foreign state, as defined in section 2 of the Special Economic Measures Act, that is the subject of an order or regulation made under that Act or the United Nations Act; or

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: a person who is the subject of an order or regulation made under section 4 of the Justice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Act (Sergei Magnitsky Law). (personne ou entité inscrite)

Subsection.Text: Subsection 10(1) of the Regulations is replaced by the following:
Subject to section 11, a report made under section 7.1 of the Act shall contain the information set out in Schedule 2.
